text: Juande Ramos (born 25 September 1954) is a former Spanish football player. When he retired from playing, he managed European clubs (e.g. Tottenham Hotspur, Real Madrid). == References == Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish footballers Category:Spanish football managers Category:PFC CSKA Moscow managers Category:Sevilla FC managers Category:MÃ¡laga CF managers
title: Juande Ramos
